Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Head and Neck Disorder/Oral Disorder/Oral Cavity and Lip Precancerous Condition/Oral Leukoplakia/Oral Cavity Leukoplakia
Record.BroaderTerm: Oral Cavity and Lip Precancerous Condition
Record.Description: A white patch or plaque on oral cavity mucosa that cannot be characterized clinically or pathologically as any other disease. The diagnosis of leukoplakia is one of exclusion; other conditions such as candidiasis, lichen planus, leukoedema, etc. must be ruled out before a diagnosis of leukoplakia can be made. Leukoplakia may be a premalignant condition. --2004
